name: Loong: The Power of the Dragon
name_original: Loong: The Power of the Dragon
description:
Loong: The Power of the Dragon is a RPG massively multiplayer game developed by Dacheng Network. It was originally released in 2011. It was published by Gamigo. The game is rated as "Skip" on RAWG.
Loong: The Power of the Dragon is available on PC.
